titleStmt.title: Description of British Library, Or 2525: A collection of abstracts of Al-Qirqisānī's Kitāb al-anwār.

notesStmt.note: Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: A collection of abstracts of Al-Qirqisānī's Kitāb al-anwār.

msItem.title: A collection of abstracts of Al-Qirqisānī's Kitāb al-anwār.

layoutDesc.layout: Columns: 1; ruled lines: 17 21; written lines: 17 21; Uniform layout. Some marginal notes.

binding.p: BM in-house. Spine: 'Abstract on Sefer Mitsvoth. Arabic. Brit. Mus. Oriental 2525.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Moses Wilhelm Shapira: (b. 1830, d. 1884), antiquities dealer of Jerusalem: purchased by the British Museum on 08 July 1882: inscribed, folio [111v].
